.. py:function:: isotonic_calibrate(pairs)

   
   Compute isotonic calibrate.

   Carry out the isotonic calibrate operation.

   :param pairs: Description for ``pairs``.
   :type pairs: List[Tuple[float, int]]

   :returns: *Mapping[str, object]* -- Description of return value.
